Summary Note:
The RM has known Daantje Luna Smeets since childhood, as their families have been close friends for many years. This long-standing relationship has fostered a deep trust and understanding between them.
Daantje Luna Smeets is a 32 year old Clinical Trials Manager from Netherlands.
She decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Daantje Luna Smeets is married to Teunissen. Their children are named Verhoeven and Terpstra.
Education Background:
Daantje received her secondary school diploma from CSG Willem van Oranje Apeldoorn in 2010.
Daantje received her degree from Han University of Applied Sciences in 2015.
Occupation History:
Daantje Luna Smeets is a 32 year old and comes from Netherlands.
Daantje Luna Smeets began her professional journey as a Research Scientist at Pfizer Nederland B.V. in 2017, laying the foundation for future success.
In 2023, she moved to Pfizer Nederland B.V. to work as a Clinical Trials Manager, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 60000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
She has villa located in Helmond, worth 2690000 EUR.

She purchased condo in Boxtel, where she spends her holidays. It is valued at 1270000 EUR.
She inherited a significant sum of 2880000 EUR from her grandmother, a respected Neurosurgeon, in 2015, which she has wisely invested.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
